sentences.en: "She is entitled to her personal allowance which is three thousand pounds of income."— 'Yes. but she doesn't earn any money.'
sentences.cn: “她享有的个人所得免税额是3,000英镑。”——“是的，但是她一分钱都不挣。”

sentences.en: Any day now her allowance would be cut off.
sentences.cn: 现在她的救济金哪一天都可能取消.

sentences.en: He lives on a single parent's allowance of £70 a week.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周70英镑的单亲家庭生活补助过日子。

sentences.en: He received a per diem allowance to cover his travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 他拿到了一笔日补贴以弥补他的差旅费。

sentences.en: If you are entitled to sickness allowance, you must claim it from your employer.
sentences.cn: 你如果有资格领取疾病津贴，必须向雇主申请索要。

sentences.en: Most of our flights have a baggage allowance of 44lbs per passenger.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数航班行李限重为每位乘客44磅。

sentences.en: Sales staff get a generous mileage allowance or a company car.
sentences.cn: 销售人员有优厚的里程补贴或者公司提供的专用汽车。

sentences.en: She can hardly dress her children on the allowance he gives her.
sentences.cn: 他给她的那点钱连给孩子买衣服都不够.

sentences.en: She gets an allowance for looking after Lillian.
sentences.cn: 她因为照顾莉莲而拿补贴。

sentences.en: She gets an allowance for taking care of Amy.
sentences.cn: 她照顾艾米是有津贴的。

sentences.en: The invaders plunder at no allowance.
The pension includes an allowance of fifty pounds for traffic expenditures.
sentences.cn: 年金中包括50镑交通费补贴.

sentences.en: The personal allowance depends on your age and marital status.
sentences.cn: 个人免税额的多少取决于年龄和婚姻状况。

sentences.en: the recommended daily allowance of Vitamin C
sentences.cn: 维生素C的每日建议摄入量

sentences.en: They subducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.cn: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

sentences.en: We should make allowance for the wishes of others.
sentences.cn: 我们应该顾及他人的愿望.

words.tran_cn: 许可的；正当的；可承认的；可获宽免

phrases.tran_cn: 行李重量限额；免费携带行李；行李津贴

trans.tran_cn: 津贴，补助，零用钱，限额，免税额
trans.tran_en: an amount of money that you are given regularly or for a special purpose
